plot: There are only a handful of children living in Bullarby. This film follows their story through the fall and winter, picking up at the moment "The Children of Noisy Village" finishes.
title: Mer om oss barn i Bullerbyn
plot_es: There are only a handful of children living in Bullarby. This film follows their story through the fall and winter, picking up at the moment "The Children of Noisy Village" finishes.
original_name: Mer om oss barn i Bullerbyn
